abstract: At 3:50 p.m., the Dow Jones industrial average was nearly flat for the day, an encouraging end to a volatile session and, perhaps, a sign that some manner of relief had started to come to Wall Street.
lead_paragraph: At 3:50 p.m., the Dow Jones industrial average was nearly flat for the day, an encouraging end to a volatile session and, perhaps, a sign that some manner of relief had started to come to Wall Street.

headline.main: Sense of Calm Is Swept Away in the Final Minutes
